In Red Faction: Guerrilla, the player takes the role of a guerrilla member, Alec Mason, as it helps the Red Faction to destabilize and overthrow the power of the Defense Force of Earth (EDF) on Mars. This presents the player a third person perspective, a departure from the series two games were first person shooters, a change that Volition intended to help the player see and appreciate the surroundings, are destroyed. Much of the play centers around 2.0 GEOMOD game engine, which allows buildings and other structures to get hurt, fall apart and collapse. In many cases, destruction of buildings will rescue the game form of currency, which can be used with rescue rewarded for completing missions to unlock new weapons and upgrade existing ones when visiting one of the safe houses Red Faction. 


During the campaign mode, the player is always equipped with a hammer as a weapon, mainly used for the destruction of buildings and smashing enemies, with a maximum of 3 other weapons or explosive devices. The player has the opportunity to control armored vehicles like tanks and walkers to more destructive options.
